func_sig.description: Evaluate arithmetic or mathematical expressions using sympy, focusing on providing exact answers with fractions or radicals when possible.
func_sig.name: evaluate_math_expressions

func_sig.description: Evaluate trigonometric expressions provided as strings, supporting operations like simplification and conversion of degrees to radians, as well as calculations involving functions such as arcsin, arccos, and arctan.
func_sig.name: evaluate_trig_expressions

expression.description: The trigonometric expression to evaluate, possibly including degree sign or functions like arcsin, arccos, arctan.

func_sig.description: Solve math problems using sympy. Evaluate steps for differentiation, integration, solving algebraic equations, and finding matrix operations.
func_sig.name: solve_math_problem
